title: Beta Client Freeze when entering Blind pick Champ select
body: So I have had no issues with the new client since I was selected for alpha testing, however, I froze when entering champ select and I got smacked with a 20 min ban even though I haven't dodged in months. Rito pls fix this. I wanna play your game. Not sit and look at numbers on the screen countdown.

replies.body:
Freezing or crashing in champ select is usually a result of a failure to establish a stable connection to the servers. Champ Select in all modes requires a more steady connection than other sections of the client as picks (and bans for Draft) are processed in real-time. 

Let us know the results. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
